t: Niall Horan - HEARTBREAK WEATHER(LP) - Amazon.com Music

s: Gotten this earlier than expected, ... Vinyl were available that day, because randomly I could finally add Flicker into my cart and purchase it. Anyways, it came fast, no damages, and it sounds great. Thanks so much ... Llegó en perfectas condiciones y en la fecha indicada. 10/10 ... Been a big Niall Horan fan for years ...

Niall Horan is amazing. His voice is magical and truly delivers with this CD release. The songs are a testament to his passion for music and display is masterful artistry. It is hard to pick a favorite song - from 'Heaven' to 'Meltdown' to 'Never Grow Up'....each song offers something special ...
